page.title: 08The "typical semi"? (9)
page.content: In our area the{houses}are mainly {semi-detached}but there are also {detached}and{terraced}houses with an occasional flat. The{typical}semi has about{7 rooms, {3 of them bedrooms,a bathroom with {sink,bath and W.C.}The{downstairs} rooms may consist of a{lounge,a dining {room and kitchen}where there could be such{appliances}as ;cooker(electric or gas),fridge-freeze,microwave,washing machine and tumble drier. Other items used for{pleasure}may include ;T.V., radio,video hi-fi and a home computer. The average number in a{family}is{4 (2 children and 2 parents). Many families keep{pets.}Here are the favouries; dogs,cats,fish and caged rodents such as gerbils,hamsters and guinea pigs.
